name: Arnold du Bruin
text: Very quiet, neat and efficient painters, External wall preparation was meticulous with all cracks cut open and properly plastered before painting commenced. Recommend using GM Painting Contractors.

name: Sarah Johnson
text: GM Painting transformed our home! The exterior was looking tired and worn, but their team did an exceptional job. Professional, clean, and completed on time. Highly recommended!

name: Michael van der Merwe
text: Our roof was leaking and needed urgent attention. Gareth and his team not only fixed the waterproofing but also repainted the entire roof. The quality is outstanding and the roof looks brand new.
